transform_def.name: mathplaydough
transform_def.string: mathplaydough_init_result(mathplaydough, mathplaydough_x, mathplaydough_y, mathplaydough_z, mathplaydough_a, mathplaydough_b)

let x = ex * pi() * (p_in.y / (1 / cos(p_in.x * ay))) / 2 y = wy * pi() * (p_in.x / (1 / sin(p_in.y * be))) / 2 tanhsin = sin(y) tanhcos = cos(y) tanhsinh = sinh(x) tanhcosh = cosh(x) tanhden = if ze > 0 then ze / (tanhcos + tanhcosh) * log(sqrt(ex / wy)) else ze * (tanhcos + tanhcosh) in vec2(tanhsinh, tanhsin) * (weight * tanhden)
